comments.body: The most canonical string here would be the short identifier according to spdx: `Apache-2.0` ... see https://spdx.org/licenses/Apache-2.0.html ... just to consider for the future ... we don't have this consistent in all the other r feedstocks...

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +42,46 @@about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=MetStaT
  license: Apache (== 2.0)
  summary: A diverse collection of metabolomics related statistical tools.
  license_family: APACHE
